channel.title: Devtools on Sudeep's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Devtools on Sudeep's Blog

item.title: Sitecore Launchpad apps and tools made easy with Bookmarklets
item.description: If you have worked with Sitecore for a while, in the version 6 or earlier days, you would remember that we didn’t have the luxury of Launchpad back then. You would spend most of the time in the desktop mode because that’s how you access most of the apps, from the start menu. Or the desktop shortcuts, which I almost never used, and I doubt most people even knew of.
